text: The Meinong Folk Village (WG: Meinung Folk VillageOfficial Website; ) is a cultural center in Meinong District, Kaohsiung, Taiwan about Hakka people. ==Exhibitions== The center exhibits the preserved Hakka cultures and local industries as well as the cultures and geography of Meinong. ==Facilities== The center includes shops and Hakka restaurant. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Taiwan ==References== Category:Cultural centers in Kaohsiung
title: Meinong Folk Village
